text_intro:
Welcome Outlander!
You arrived at your destination: a deserted island.

combinations.text: Mixing item1 and item2 gives you item12

places.name: startplace
places.text: You are standing on a sandy beach.

interactables.name: ground
interactables.text_place: You see something shiny on the ground.
interactables.text_place_taken: There is just garbage on the ground.
interactables.text_look: As you look closely you find a knife in the sand.
interactables.text_look_taken: It's just sand. I don't have time to build a sand castle.

interactables.name: paper
interactables.information: Go staight on, turn right twice then turn left.
interactables.text_place: There is a paper in the sand.
interactables.text_place_taken: There is just more garbage in the sand.
interactables.text_look: As you look closely, you realize that the paper is a map.
interactables.text_look_taken: It's just sand. I don't have time to build a sand castle.

interactables.name: safe
interactables.text_place: As you look on your left you see an oldsafe on the ground.
interactables.text_place_taken: As you look at the open safe the open safe is look back at you.
interactables.text_unlock: You open the safe with the key. The safe contained coins.

interactables.name: box
interactables.text_place: There is a misterious box in front of you.
interactables.text_place_taken: The box lying in front of you is not misterious anymore.
interactables.text_look: As you examine it you realize that it needs a password.
interactables.text_unlock: The box contained a rusty_spoon. It is strange, but I like rusty spoons.

adjacent_places.name: place2
adjacent_places.text: There is a path into the jungle.

items.name: key
items.text: An old key, seems like it can open something very old.

adjacent_places.name: startplace
adjacent_places.text: The beach where your journey started.
